name: findadoc-server
description: Backend for Find a Doc, Japan

scripts.dev:
echo '
🧶 Installing yarn dependencies...🧶
' && yarn && yarn generate && yarn dev:startserver
scripts.dev:startserver:
echo '
💻 💻 💻✨ Starting dev server...' && cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --esm src/index.ts
scripts.test:
echo '
🧶 Installing yarn dependencies...🧶
' && yarn && vitest
scripts.testold:
echo '
🧶 Installing yarn dependencies...🧶
' && yarn && jest --forceExit --maxWorkers=1
scripts.prod:build:
echo '
🧶 Installing yarn dependencies...🧶
' && yarn  --immutable --frozen-lockfile && echo '
🧹 cleaning dist folder...
' && rimraf dist/ && echo '
➡ ➡ copying files...
' && copyfiles 'src/typeDefs/schema.graphql' '.env.*' 'jest.config.js' 'dist' && echo '
💻✨ compiling code...
' && tsc
scripts.prod:startserver:
echo '
💻 💻 💻✨ Starting prod server...' && cross-env NODE_ENV=production pm2 start dist/src/index.js
scripts.prod:dockerstart:
echo '
🐳 🐳 🐳✨ Running docker compose...' && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose-api.yml up -d --build --remove-orphans --force-recreate
scripts.prod:dockerstop:
echo '
🐳 🐳 🐳✨ Stopping docker compose...' && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose-api.yml down
scripts.generate:
echo '
➡ ➡ ➡ Generating types from graphql schema ➡ ➡ ➡
' && graphql-codegen --config ./typesgeneratorconfig.ts

author: Find a Doc, Japan
